BackstoryDef.title: exterminator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Taken in as a simple soldier by a particularly zealous wing of religious believers, [PAWN_nameDef] was schooled in the arts of strategy, war, and medicine, serving in an army as both a reliable medic and a powerful general. /nThough that life is now long behind, [PAWN_nameDef] still finds it hard to change [PAWN_possessive] mind on various theological topics.

BackstoryDef.title: warcleric
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Taken in as a simple soldier by a particularly zealous wing of religious believers, [PAWN_nameDef] was schooled in the arts of strategy, war, and medicine, serving in an army as both a reliable medic and a powerful general. /nThough that life is now long behind, [PAWN_nameDef] still finds it hard to change [PAWN_possessive] mind on various theological topics.

BackstoryDef.title: goldguard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] once stood guard for a large gold-filled treasury in the core of an ancient underground fortress in which [PAWN_pronoun] thrived in, keeping it safe from thieves and raiders \nThe nights spent alone have taken a toll on [PAWN_possessive] speech.

BackstoryDef.title: inquisitor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Under the cruel hand of a malicious lord, [PAWN_nameDef] slaughtered and assassinated many religious enemies who refused to be subjugated. Treated as nothing more than a weapon by [PAWN_possessive] masters, [PAWN_pronoun] now suffers when it comes to socialization.

BackstoryDef.title: gatekeeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef], along with various comrades, guarded a large deepgate which served as an entrance to an underground fortress. [PAWN_pronoun] discovered many things and interesting people in those days.

BackstoryDef.title: insect hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Hunting, dispatching and harvesting insectoids is second nature to [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] knows exactly how megaspiders think and act, and knows everything about their anatomy.

BackstoryDef.title: abyssal marine
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] suffered weeks of ruthless training in the unforgiving depths of a shell-world, fighting other trainees in the darkness.
